snippet.title: SSBU - Waluigi Mod (Download in Description)
snippet.description:
Download - https://gamebanana.com/mods/443150


I am a man of my word. I complied with my deadline, so here you all go.
This video is pretty straight forward it's just the final moveset of my Waluigi mod. It's been a really long and sometimes frustrating road but all in all I wouldnt change it one bit. I just want to thank everyone for sticking with me and trusting the process. These will certanly be more mods in the future.

Also,  I want to shout out @mRama3415 (twitter). Rama was a HUGE help with alot of this mod. 


DISCLAIMER -

I'm not in any way a professional  animator or coder. I just do my best. Enjoy

Channels/Links-

mRama - 


https://twitter.com/mrama3415


Yanpai -


/ @MrYanpai 


v Estevo - 


 / @vestevo  


Lr31o - 
  

 / @lr31o  
  

MKHT -

/@MKHT 


Special Thanks -
Yanpai - Created the original Waluigi render used in this trailer.

MRama - They helped with some of the coding you'll see in the upcoming video.

v Estevo - He is the foundation of this mod. Most model work is his doing. More like a partner than just help.

Lr31o/Thom - He helped me understand the banner art's lighting.

MKHT - A lot of my mods inspiration came from his Waluigi Mod from SSBB you’ll see in the upcoming video. Also the Biker Waluigi original design was made by him. 

Smash Ultimate modding discord - They help me a ton with things I know nothing about.

Waluigi Mod Discord - https://discord.gg/6tcHGtuD

Mural Art -
https://www.dropbox.com/s/ki7hqpykg3l...

No copyright intended. I do not own the music or characters in this video/rights to Nintendo. I do not take credit for this the characters or music.
